descriptionLong: This website is built using astro js, Tailwind, react and decap cms. It showcases my skills and projects and includes a blog section where I write about my life as a developer. I focused on simplicity and high performance and maintained a 100 lighthouse score. I used Netlifys functionalites to keep the website as simple as possible.
title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio website showcases my skills, projects, and includes a blog section.
